name: Element5 Digital
tagline: Crafting a better web to thrive in a digital world
description: We’re a collective of creative pioneers. We have a passion for the digital world and an overwhelming love for creating memorable experiences on the Web. We believe humor leads to brilliant insights. We believe traditional mediums are not dead. We specialize in transforming your brand’s presence from run-of-the-mill to remarkable. We’ll find the core essence of what you stand for—and what you’re against—and shape that into a solid stance.
